After using [[Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death]], the tree that trapped the opponent explodes.

== Trivia ==
* Because this is a genjutsu, Kurenai most likely planted an [[explosive tag]] or some other exploding object on the opponent.

[[es:Ilusión Demoníaca: Muerte de Prisión Arbórea Explosiva]]
[[pl:Demoniczna Iluzja: Eksplozja Wiążącego Drzewa Śmierci]]
